messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Minimally Invasive Education: Lessons From India
messages.msgSnippet: beautiful video, really interesting!!!!!   This reminds me that  Winston Churchill said he loved to learn, but he hated to be taught. ... From: Lyssa Balick
messages.messageBody:
beautiful video, really interesting!!!!!   This reminds me that  Winston Churchill said he loved to learn, but he hated to be taught.
--- On Sun, 4/19/09, Lyssa Balick <catonsvillenanny@...> wrote:


From: Lyssa Balick <catonsvillenanny@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Minimally Invasive Education: Lessons From India
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, April 19, 2009, 9:38 PM








thanks for this.  I watched this video about 6 months ago.  It completely blew me away:
http://video. google.com/ videosearch? q=minimally+ invasive+ education& hl=en&emb= 0&aq=f#

-Lyssa
